comment.author: 27812488@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called New Zealand in Stereoscopic 3D, and we'd love to have this added to the group! More people can see computer 3D in anaglyph format than in cross-eye format as used here. (These will be non-transposed images as they came from William's camera). Anaglyphs do not need ocular gymnastics and work especially well with monochrome images. I have made a version which is both cross-eye and anaglyph here: www.flickr.com/photos/kiwizone/3911369248/
